```{r}
library(raster)
poly <- readOGR("National_Parks","National_Parks")
crs(poly)
poly$area_sqkm <- area(poly) / 1000000

area_data<-data.frame(poly$PARKNAME, poly$area_sqkm)
write.csv(area_data, "area_data.csv")
```
